outlets.name: TiVo 500GB box
outlets.description: The TiVo box can store an amazing 250 hours of standard TV (50 hours of HD), suggest shows and search live TV, Catch Up and more. You can record two shows and watch a third too. The TiVo service costs £3 a month, and there's an activation fee of 49.95.

outlets.name: TiVo 1TB box
outlets.description: The TiVo box can store an amazing 500 hours of standard TV (100 hours of HD), suggest shows and search live TV, Catch Up and more. You can record two shows and watch a third too. The TiVo service costs £3 a month, and there's an activation fee of 99.95.

add-ons.description: Includes Sky Sports 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 & F1 and all Sky Cinema

add-ons.name: Talk Mobile
add-ons.description: Add Talk Mobile to your package to save 33% on calls to mobiles from your Virgin Phone line.

add-ons.name: Talk 08
add-ons.description: Includes calls to numbers beginning 0845 or 0870 all day, every day.

add-ons.name: Talk International
add-ons.description: If you've got friends and family overseas, choose Talk International for fantastic savings on international calls.

add-ons.name: Talk Asian Mela
add-ons.description: with another addition of 500minutes of calls to India / Pakistan / Bangladesh a month

add-ons.name: Anonymous Caller Rejection
add-ons.description: Stops calls from withheld numbers.

add-ons.name: Free Voicemail
add-ons.description: The free voicemail service available to Virgin Phone customers.

add-ons.name: Call features pack
add-ons.description: Get one for £2.25 a month or pay £3.90 a month for as many as you like including one of Call Divert/Call Waiting/Voice Mail plus.

add-ons.name: 3 Way Calling
add-ons.description: Lets three people chat at the same time.

add-ons.name: Call Waiting
add-ons.description: Pick up your messages from anywhere and record a greeting.

add-ons.name: Quick Dial
add-ons.description: No need to remember numbers you use frequently.

add-ons.name: Voicemail Plus
add-ons.description: Access your messages from anywhere.

add-ons.name: Ring Back When Free
add-ons.description: Set your phone to ring when an engaged number becomes free.

add-ons.name: Caller Display
add-ons.description: Lets you see who's calling before you answer.

add-ons.name: Reminder Call
add-ons.description: Get a personal alarm call.

add-ons.name: Call Divert
add-ons.description: Divert calls to another number. Not available with free voicemail - add Voicemail Plus instead.
